pages.text: $(li)The Golden Apple is an eatable item that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/golden_apple_crate)Golden Apple Crate$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)When eaten gives you five seconds of $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/regeneration)Renegeration$(/l) II effect, healing your health while this effect is active.$(br)$(li)It gives the $(l)Absorption$() effect, adding to you for two minutes two extra hearts of life or when they are broken by receiving damage.
